game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to quest giver.
game.description: You've heard rumors that the lost artifact is hidden deep in the ruins of an old temple. It's time to set out on your adventure!
game.reward: 1000 gold coins and a legendary weapon

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
